name: AstroStuck
description:
In this short game you play as an astronaut trying to make it back to their ship after being abandoned. Solve a few puzzles in order to get back.
Keep an eye on the dialog as it can tell you how to use certain abilities but you can always come back here for a reminder!

Controls:

  • Left click to grab an object. 
  • Right click to let the object go. 
  • Hold space to use jetpack.
  • WASD to move.
